isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION, TANDEM AXLES: SPICER J400-S, W460-S - INSTALL - CARRIER ASSEMBLY

step1.para: Thoroughly clean the inside of the carrier housing and inspect the housing mounting surface for nicks and general cleanliness. Stone the surface if necessary to remove burrs or nicks.
Apply a 1/4 inch bead of RTV gasket material onto the housing carrier mounting flange and around each bolt hole ( Figure 139).

figure.caption: Figure 138. Apply RTV Gasket Material onto Housing Carrier Mounting Flange

step1.para: Thread 2 studs into housing 180 degrees apart to aid installation of the carrier. This will also eliminate rotating carrier assembly after it is in contact with the RTV gasket material.
Install carrier into housing. Clean mounting bolts, and coat with Loctite #277 (red), or its equivalent, and install. Tighten to 160 to 185 ft-lbs. (217 to 251 Nm).
Allow one hour cure time for RTV gasket material before adding hypoid lubricant.
Remove old axle flange gasket and clean mating surfaces of hub and axle flange.
Install axle shaft. Refer to the TORQUE CHART for proper torque specifications of axle flange nuts.

Clean mating surfaces on axle housing and output shaft bearing retainer. Apply a 1/8 inch bead of RTV gasket material on housing flange and around bolt holes. Install output shaft. Tighten mounting bolts evenly to 30 to 40 ft-lbs. (41 to 54 Nm).
Install drive shafts. Connect air line to power divider control on forward axle assembly.
Clean and install drain plug. Fill unit to proper level with hypoid gear lubricant.
